verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֨ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- And thou son אָדָ֜ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man קַח־ <WH3947> kach- take לְךָ֣׀ le-Cha חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev knife חַדָּ֗ה <WH2299> chad-Dah, thee a sharp תַּ֤עַר <WH8593> Ta-'ar razor הַגַּלָּבִים֙ <WH1532> hag-gal-la-Vim thee a barber's תִּקָּחֶ֣נָּה <WH3947> tik-ka-Chen-nah take לָּ֔ךְ Lach, וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֥ <WH5674> ve-ha-'a-var-Ta and cause [it] to pass עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשְׁךָ֖ <WH7218> ro-she-Cha upon thine head וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and זְקָנֶ֑ךָ <WH2206> ze-ka-Ne-cha; and upon thy beard וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta then take לְךָ֛ <WH99999> le-Cha מֹאזְנֵ֥י <WH3976> moz-Nei thee balances מִשְׁקָ֖ל <WH4948> mish-Kal to weigh וְחִלַּקְתָּֽם׃ <WH2505> ve-chil-lak-Tam. and divide

שְׁלִשִׁ֗ית <WH7992> she-li-Shit, a third part בָּא֤וּר <WH217> ba-'Ur with fire תַּבְעִיר֙ <WH1197> tav-'Ir Thou shalt burn בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, of the city כִּמְלֹ֖את <WH4390> kim-Lot are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei when the days הַמָּצ֑וֹר <WH4692> ham-ma-Tzor; of the siege וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta and thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֗ית <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shit, a third part תַּכֶּ֤ה <WH5221> tak-Keh [and] smite בַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> va-Che-rev it with a knife סְבִ֣יבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH5439> se-Vi-vo-Tei-ha, about וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <WH7992> ve-hash-she-li-Shit and a third part תִּזְרֶ֣ה <WH2219> tiz-Reh thou shalt scatter לָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> la-Ru-ach, in the wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ve-Che-rev a sword אָרִ֥יק <WH7324> 'a-Rik and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta Thou shalt also take מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> mish-Sham also מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> me-'At thereof a few בְּמִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> be-mis-Par; in number וְצַרְתָּ֥ <WH6696> ve-tzar-Ta and bind אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam בִּכְנָפֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3671> bich-na-Fei-cha. them in thy skirts

וּמֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> u-me-Hem like ע֣וֹד <WH5750> od again תִּקָּ֔ח <WH3947> tik-Kach, Then take of them again וְהִשְׁלַכְתָּ֤ <WH7993> ve-hish-lach-Ta and cast אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> Toch them into the midst הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ha-'Esh, of the fire וְשָׂרַפְתָּ֥ <WH8313> ve-sa-raf-Ta and burn אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh; them in the fire מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu some תֵצֵא־ <WH3318> te-tze- come forth אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> 'esh [for] thereof shall a fire אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit into all the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD זֹ֚את <WH2063> zot likewise יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, This [is] Jerusalem בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch it in the midst הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of the nations שַׂמְתִּ֑יהָ <WH7760> sam-Ti-ha; I have set וּסְבִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH5439> u-se-vi-vo-Tei-ha [that are] round about אֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> a-ra-Tzot. and countries

וַתֶּ֨מֶר <WH4784> vat-Te-mer And she hath changed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִשְׁפָּטַ֤י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai my judgments לְרִשְׁעָה֙ <WH7564> le-rish-'Ah into wickedness מִן־ <WH4480> min- more הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, more than the nations וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tai, and my statutes מִן־ <WH4480> min- than הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot more than the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Tei-ha; that [are] round about כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for בְמִשְׁפָּטַי֙ <WH4941> ve-mish-pa-Tai my judgments מָאָ֔סוּ <WH3988> ma-'A-su, her for they have refused וְחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <WH2708> ve-chuk-ko-Tai and my statutes לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> ha-le-Chu they have not walked בָהֶֽם׃ <WH99999> va-Hem. ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD יַ֤עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because הֲמָנְכֶם֙ <WH1995> ha-ma-ne-Chem Because ye multiplied מִן־ <WH4480> min- have more הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim more than the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5439> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem, that [are] round about בְּחֻקּוֹתַי֙ <WH2708> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <WH1980> ha-lach-Tem, you [and] have not walked וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai my judgments לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <WH6213> 'a-si-Tem; neither have kept וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <WH4941> u-che-mish-pe-Tei according to the judgments הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5439> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem that [are] round about לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> 'a-si-Tem. neither have done ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich I am against גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- even אָ֑נִי <WH589> 'A-ni; I וְעָשִׂ֧יתִי <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ti Behold I even I [am] against thee and will execute בְתוֹכֵ֛ךְ <WH8432> ve-to-Chech in the midst מִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> mish-pa-Tim judgments לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei of thee in the sight הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim. of the nations

וְעָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ti And I will do בָ֗ךְ Vach, אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will never עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti, in thee that which I have not done וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> ve-'Et אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- of which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will never אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh and whereunto I will not do כָמֹ֖הוּ <WH3644> cha-Mo-hu and the like ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; again יַ֖עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an any more the like because כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all תּוֹעֲבֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8441> to-'a-vo-Ta-yich. of all thine abominations ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore אָב֞וֹת <WH1> a-Vot Therefore the fathers יֹאכְל֤וּ <WH398> yo-che-Lu shall eat בָנִים֙ <WH1121> va-Nim the sons בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> be-to-Chech, in the midst וּבָנִ֖ים <WH1121> u-va-Nim of thee and the sons יֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> yo-che-Lu shall eat אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam; their fathers וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ti and I will execute בָךְ֙ voCh שְׁפָטִ֔ים <WH8201> she-fa-Tim, judgments וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <WH2219> ve-ze-ri-Ti of thee will I scatter אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שְׁאֵרִיתֵ֖ךְ <WH7611> she-'e-ri-Tech in thee and the whole remnant לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to every רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> Ru-ach. into all the winds פ Peh

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> la-Chen So חַי־ <WH2416> chai- Wherefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֮ <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> Lo, no יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an because אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <WH4720> mik-da-Shi my sanctuary טִמֵּ֔את <WH2930> tim-Met, Surely because thou hast defiled בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all שִׁקּוּצַ֖יִךְ <WH8251> shik-ku-Tza-yich with all thy detestable things וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all תּוֹעֲבֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH8441> to-'a-vo-Ta-yich; and with all thine abominations וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- will also אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I אֶגְרַע֙ <WH1639> 'eg-Ra' therefore will I also diminish וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no תָח֣וֹס <WH2347> ta-Chos spare עֵינִ֔י <WH5869> 'ei-Ni, [thee] neither shall mine eye וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- will also אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo no אֶחְמֽוֹל׃ <WH2550> ech-Mol. neither will I have any pity

שְׁלִשִׁתֵ֞יךְ <WH7992> she-li-shi-Teich A third part בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <WH1698> bad-De-ver with the pestilence יָמ֗וּתוּ <WH4191> ya-Mu-tu, of thee shall die וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <WH7458> u-va-ra-'Av and with famine יִכְל֣וּ <WH3615> yich-Lu shall they be consumed בְתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> ve-to-Chech, in the midst וְהַ֨שְּׁלִשִׁ֔ית <WH7992> ve-Hash-she-li-Shit, of thee and a third part בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev by the sword יִפְּל֣וּ <WH5307> yip-pe-Lu shall fall סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Ta-yich; round about וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁית֙ <WH7992> ve-hash-she-li-Shit a third part לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to every ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach into all the winds אֱזָרֶ֔ה <WH2219> 'e-za-Reh, thee and I will scatter וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ve-Che-rev a sword אָרִ֥יק <WH7324> 'a-Rik and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וְכָלָ֣ה <WH3615> ve-cha-Lah be accomplished אַפִּ֗י <WH639> 'ap-Pi, Thus shall mine anger וַהֲנִחוֹתִ֧י <WH5117> va-ha-ni-cho-Ti to rest חֲמָתִ֛י <WH2534> cha-ma-Ti and I will cause my fury בָּ֖ם bam וְהִנֶּחָ֑מְתִּי <WH5162> ve-hin-ne-Cha-me-ti; upon them and I will be comforted וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that I the LORD דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti have spoken בְּקִנְאָתִ֔י <WH7068> be-kin-'a-Ti, [it] in my zeal בְּכַלּוֹתִ֥י <WH3615> be-chal-lo-Ti when I have accomplished חֲמָתִ֖י <WH2534> cha-ma-Ti my fury בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וְאֶתְּנֵךְ֙ <WH5414> ve-'et-te-neCh Moreover I will make לְחָרְבָּ֣ה <WH2723> le-cha-re-Bah thee waste וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <WH2781> u-le-cher-Pah, and a reproach בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim among the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Ta-yich; that [are] round about לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei thee in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all עוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> o-Ver. of all that pass by

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <WH1961> ve-Ha-ye-Tah will be a חֶרְפָּ֤ה <WH2781> cher-Pah So it shall be a reproach וּגְדוּפָה֙ <WH1422> u-ge-du-Fah and a taunt מוּסָ֣ר <WH4148> mu-Sar an instruction וּמְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH4923> u-me-sham-Mah, and an astonishment לַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> lag-go-Yim unto the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Ta-yich; that [are] round about בַּעֲשׂוֹתִי֩ <WH6213> ba-'a-so-Ti thee when I shall execute בָ֨ךְ vach שְׁפָטִ֜ים <WH8201> she-fa-Tim judgments בְּאַ֤ף <WH639> be-'Af in thee in anger וּבְחֵמָה֙ <WH2534> u-ve-che-Mah and in fury וּבְתֹכְח֣וֹת <WH8433> u-ve-to-che-Chot rebukes חֵמָ֔ה <WH2534> che-Mah, and in furious אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti. have spoken

בְּֽשַׁלְּחִ֡י <WH7971> be-shal-le-Chi When I shall send אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חִצֵּי֩ <WH2671> chitz-Tzei arrows הָרָעָ֨ב <WH7458> ha-ra-'Av of famine הָרָעִ֤ים <WH7451> ha-ra-'Im upon them the evil בָּהֶם֙ ba-Hem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH4889> le-mash-Chit, which shall be for [their] destruction אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> 'a-shal-Lach [and] which I will send אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam לְשַֽׁחֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH7843> le-sha-chet-Chem; to destroy וְרָעָב֙ <WH7458> ve-ra-'Av the famine אֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> 'o-Sef you and I will increase עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem, upon וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֥י <WH7665> ve-sha-var-Ti upon you and will break לָכֶ֖ם <WH99999> la-Chem מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> mat-teh- your staff לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> La-chem. of bread

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֣י <WH7971> ve-shil-lach-Ti So will I send עֲ֠לֵיכֶם <WH5921> 'A-lei-chem on רָעָ֞ב <WH7458> ra-'Av upon you famine וְחַיָּ֤ה <WH2416> ve-chai-Yah beasts רָעָה֙ <WH7451> ra-'Ah and evil וְשִׁכְּלֻ֔ךְ <WH7921> ve-shik-ke-Luch, and they shall bereave וְדֶ֥בֶר <WH1698> ve-De-ver thee and pestilence וָדָ֖ם <WH1818> va-Dam and blood יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> ya-'a-vor- shall pass through בָּ֑ךְ Bach; וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> ve-Che-rev the sword אָבִ֣יא <WH935> 'a-Vi thee and I will bring עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich, and אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh upon thee I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti. have spoken פ Peh
